Text: West Texas Receipt Capacity Cc Michelle As we discussed please forward a new ammendment to our existing Red Rock Agreement that will move dthday of primary receipt point capacity from East of Thoreau to the West Texas Pool for the period November until February If you have any questions please feel free to give me a call Best Regards David Smith

Ammendment Michelle Ready for the long weekend I have received the final amendment for Red Rock and should have it signed this afternoon I assume that all other amendments are in your Contract Dept Please let me know if there are any missing numbers Thanks Best Regards David
Red Rock UpdateJust checking in to see how the Red Rock expasion was going and to see if you could provide me with a breakdown of how our Demand and Variable charges will look like No rush Thanks
AmmendmentsMichelle I just faxed the signed ammendments to Craig Let me know if you hear of any problems Otherwise have a great weekend Best Regards David Smith

Red Rock Receipts Cc Michelle Per our conversation PPL EnergyPlus requests that Transwestern assign mmbtu of primary receipts out of the West Texas Pool for the period beginning June through September During the four month period beginning October and ending February the primary receipts will be reduced to mmbtu Beginning March through June primary receipts will be increased to mmbtu For the four month period beginning October and ending February PPL requests an additional day to consider our supply options prior to electing a primary receipt for the mmbtu not assigned Best Regards David Smith

Red Rock Receipts Cc Michelle Per our conversation PPL EnergyPlus requests that Transwestern assign mmbtu of primary receipts out of the West Texas Pool for the period beginning June through September During the four month period beginning October and ending February the primary receipts will be reduced to mmbtu Beginning March through June primary receipts will be increased to mmbtu For the four month period beginning October and ending February PPL requests an additional day to consider our supply options prior to electing a primary receipt for the mmbtu not assigned Best Regards David Smith

West Texas Pool Cc Michelle Per our conversation on January please assign dth of available West Texas Pool receipts for contract during the four months beginning November and ending February We will continue to look for the remaining As for Amendment which increased our West Texas receipts to during the period described above I do not see anything Can you send me another copy and I will get that signed today Sorry for the confusion If you have any questions please give me a call Best Regards David

RE Firm Transport on Transwestern for November Cc PPL agrees with the suggested change in language I have forwarded the Request for Transportation Service Thanks for your help Original Message From mailto Sent Tuesday October AM To Smith David L Subject Firm Transport on Transwestern for November Transwestern is in agreement with extending your Firm transport from Griffith to PGE with alternate delivery at Southwest Gas The term is November for at a rate of all inclusive with zero fuel Regulatory needs a paragraph substitution see below and unfortunately Contracts will issue a new number because of the changes Please submit a new Service Request and I will approve Thanks Substitute For the term of this amendment if any quantities nominated by Shipper hereunder cannot be scheduled because of an event of Force Majeure Transwestern shall further discount the rate applicable to such quantities nominated but not scheduled to zero In place of For the term of this Amendment Transwestern agrees to provide an additional discount to the Shipper for quantities that could not be scheduled hereunder due to an event of Force Majeure as reasonably determined by Transwestern rendering the supplies unavailable The additional discount will be an amount equal to any quantities made unavailable multiplied by the Discounted Rate This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

West Texas Capacity Cc Michelle PPL EnergyPlus requests dth of available West Texas receipts to supplement the dth already allocated as part of its contract for a total of Please forward any documentation for our execution Thanks for you assistance in this matter Best Regards David Smith

RE Contract Addendum Cc Michelle This language works fine for PPL EnergyPlus Thanks for your help Original Message From mailto Sent Thursday October PM To Smith David L Cc Cammarano Joseph A Subject RE Contract Addendum David Legal reviewed your concern with referencing the upstream contract and they came up with the following paragraph One additional change lets use the word discount versus creditthis works better with our tariff Let me know if this will work Thanks For the term of this Amendment Transwestern agrees to provide an additional discount to the Shipper for quantities that could not be scheduled hereunder due to an event of Force Majeure as reasonably determined by Transwestern rendering the supplies unavailable The additional discount will be an amount equal to any quantities made unavailable multiplied by the Discounted Rate Original Message From mailto Sent Wednesday October PM To Lokay Michelle Cc Subject RE Contract Addendum Michelle This language is fine Please forward the addendum at your convenience Best Regards David Original Message From mailto Sent Wednesday October PM To Smith David L Subject RE Contract Addendum David Here is Legals spin on the amendmentcan you guys work with this Do you know the upstream contract number Thanks For the term of this Amendment Transwestern agrees to provide a credit to the Shipper for quantities that could not be scheduled hereunder due to an event of Force Majeure as reasonably determined by Transwestern on Contract No upstream contract rendering the supplies unavailable The amount of the credit will be calculated by multiplying the quantities made unavailable by the Discounted Rate Original Message From mailto Sent Friday September PM To Lokay Michelle Cc Subject Contract Addendum Michelle Here is a quick paragraph that I think addresses the Force Majuere issue Joe is out this afternoon and may inject his thoughts so lets touch base on Monday Have a good weekend I hope the dentist was kind Best Regards David For the term of this Amendment Transwestern agrees to provide a credit to the Shipper for quantities made unavailable due to an event of Force Majuere declared solely by Transwestern The amount of the credit will be calculated by multiplying the quantities made unavailable by the Discounted Rate This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

September Transportation Cc Michelle As we discussed PPL EnergyPlus is interested in transportation service from Griffith Energy Delivery to points downstream at the same rates we now receive This also includes a zero fuel rate If you have any questions please feel free to give me a call Best Regards David Smith
